mapper.select: select t2.id as orderId, t2.order_code, t2.order_name, t2.order_status, t.id as orderMaterialActId, t.group_stock_id, t.assign_detail_id, t1.material_type_id, t.trade_no, t3.ebs_wh_code, t3.ebs_wh_child_code, t5.price as currentMaterialTypePrice, t.price as oldOrderMaterialActPrice, t4.price as oldGroupStockPrice, t3.price as oldAssignDetailPrice from bu_work_order_material_acts t left join bu_work_order_material t1 on t1.id = t.order_material_id left join bu_work_order t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id left join bu_material_assign_detail t3 on t3.id = t.assign_detail_id left join bu_material_group_stock t4 on t4.id = t.group_stock_id left join bu_material_type t5 on t5.id = t1.material_type_id where t2.order_status = 3 and t.price = 0 and t.act_amount > 0 order by t2.order_code, t1.material_type_id
